title: Ka thlarau kal la hlau lovin
lyrics:
Ka thlarau, kal la hlau lovin,
Sawta Zion tlangah sawnin,
Chu tlang chu en chungin kal la;
Chuta thing kraws chu en ang che,
Tah chuan i Lalpa an khengbet;
A nak thianghlimah thi a luang.

Kha Kalvari tlang sangah khan,
Remna ropui tak an hmu ang,
Chhak leh thlang, chhim leh hmara mi'n;
Mi, thihna thima awmte khan,
Thim mah se tlang chu an enin,
Chatuanin an thlamuan tawh ang.

A kilhna thir kha en turin,
Eng ang pawhin hla selangin,
A lu kum pawh kha an hmu ang;
Eng zata tam pawh a thleng thei,
Vur anga sil varna a nei,
Sual bawlhhlawh a lang tawh lo vang.
